gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 129, Pacers 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Pacers, 129-102. Brandon Ingram led the way for the Pelicans with 34 points (13-21 FG), eight rebounds and seven assists, while Trey Murphy III added 28 points (6-12 3pt. FG) and seven rebounds in the victory. Isaiah Jackson tallied 13 points and 10 rebounds for the Pacers in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 36-25 on the season, while the Pacers fall to 34-27.
